meanings.definition: Not capable of being used or repaired.
meanings.sent1: The old, unserviceable car sat abandoned in the garage.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic declared the broken engine unserviceable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fix the unserviceable toaster only made it worse.
meanings.sent4: Her unserviceable phone left her feeling disconnected from the world.
meanings.sent5: The unserviceable bridge posed a danger to anyone who crossed it.

meanings.sent1: The unserviceable heater failed to keep the room warm.
meanings.sent2: The pilot grounded the unserviceable plane for repairs.
meanings.sent3: The unserviceable alarm clock made her late for work again.
meanings.sent4: His unserviceable laptop crashed right before the important presentation.
meanings.sent5: The unserviceable brakes on the bike caused a dangerous accident.
